title: 105_hr3018
content: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to release US reversionary interests in four deeds that conveyed certain lands within the Blackwater River and Withlacoochee State Forests in Florida. Requires lands conveyed under the deeds to be used for public purposes. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the Board of Trustees of the Internal Improvement Trust Fund of the State of Florida all of the US mineral interests in any real property for which a reversionary interest is released.
